snippet: NYSE Euronext and Deutsche Börse said they were in talks to call off their planned merger, after European antitrust regulators formally opposed the deal.
abstract: NYSE Euronext and Deutsche Börse said they were in talks to call off their planned merger, after European antitrust regulators formally opposed the deal.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED, JAMES KANTER and JACK EWING

lead_paragraph: NYSE Euronext and Deutsche Börse said on Wednesday that they were in talks to call off their planned merger, after European antitrust regulators formally opposed the deal.

headline.main: NYSE and Deutsche Borse Plan to Call Off Merger
